text: The 2014–15 Professional Football League is the third highest division in Russian football. The Professional Football League is geographically divided into 5 zones. The winners of each zone are automatically promoted into the National Football League. The bottom finishers of each zone lose professional status and are relegated into the Amateur Football League. ==West== ===Standings=== ===Top scorers=== Source: pfl-russia.com ;20 goals *Vladimir
